title: Console / cmd.exe add additional fonts
body:
Add additional fonts and font sizes to the windows / cmd.exe console in windows 8+.
The current font selection needs to be expanded especially at smaller font sizes.
Nice to have: A setting in console window system menu to add 'open console here' right click menu command to windows explorer (without hitting alt/shift right click like in windows 8.

comments.body: Additionally the font-linking should be done by default. Right now you switch to "chcp 65001", and type in Chinese characters they appear as replacement boxes. There should be a reasonable set of default linkings.
Conhost font selection implemented as of 14951.
+1 on this. The current codepage-to-hardcoded-font-list mapping is way too unintuitive. Few likes to go to the registry simply for changing trivial options like font settings in conhost.
